title: Wanwu Bu Jie Liuzhuan, Shengming Zhi Mei Jin Xian

alternative_titles.ja: 万物不竭流转，生命至美尽显

synopsis:
Deep in the forest, there is a legend about the goddess of life. In the land beyond the sky where she lives, all things live and breathe from the fingertips of God, and spread to the world, bringing all the revelations of beauty...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
